All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, Reportable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ALSBeagleTreeLikelihood, AncestralStateBeagleTreeLikelihood
public class BeagleTreeLikelihood
extends AbstractTreeLikelihood

BeagleTreeLikelihoodModel - implements a Likelihood Function for sequences on a tree.

Version:

Author:
